product_name: CygoLite ExpiliOn 800 USB Front Bike Light
long_description: The CygoLite ExpiliOn 800 USB front bike light includes a powerful 800-lumen beam for daily commutes, singletrack at dusk or low-light training. When it's time to recharge, just plug into a USB port. 2nd generation Cree XM-L LED puts out a powerful maximum of 800 lumens and is paired with precise optics for a beam pattern that's optimized for cycling. Aluminum bezel helps protect light and improves durability; water-resistant design protects light from inclement conditions. 4 constant lighting modes: boost, high, medium and low. Four special lighting modes: 2-in-1 SteadyPulse(TM), day flash, walking and S.O.S. SteadyPulse illumination mode combines steady brightness with an alerting flash, letting you see what's ahead of you while simultaneously letting others know your presence. Day Flash mode enhances rider visibility in peak daylight. Run times vary between 2.3 hrs. (boost) and 38 hrs. (S.O.S.). Removable, quick-release lithium-ion battery stick can be charged via computer USB port or an electrical outlet; charge time of 5 hrs. Illuminated control button features built-in power indicators for easy reference and access; includes low battery and charging status indicators. Quick-release mount on the CygoLite ExpiliOn 800 USB light fits 25.4 - 31.8mm diameter handlebars. CygoLite ExpiliOn 800 USB bike light comes with a battery stick, USB cable, wall charger, helmet mount and tool-free handlebar mount.
